ygData.subject: Animations/Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail and Well Met, I am wondering if anyone that has the Selo s Song of Travel has noticed the animation acting funny. To me, it looks as if the animatioon for
ygData.messageBody:
Hail and Well Met,

I am wondering if anyone that has the Selo's Song of Travel has noticed the
animation acting funny. To me, it looks as if the animatioon for the silly
waddle and the arm waving are trying to go off at the same time, resulting
in my character leaning hard to one side sometimes or waddling erratically.
Is it just me?

I finally went to my first plane Sunday. We went to Hate, overall had a
great time. We had around 35 players from at least 3 guilds but it went very
well due to a very experienced leader and pull team. I was the Only bard
there all day. Died 4 times but got rezzed back fast (all those clerics are
clarity addicts hehe). I got the Martune rapier, imbrued boots, and BP. The
Maestro went down easy, only dropped a monk mask. Innoruk however cleaned
all our clocks handily! So now I have on silvery legs and hero bracer since
my groups decided the lambent blue clashed with the imbrued. I really need
to find those singing steel gloves now!

Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur, Xegony
